Reviews.Title: “Very nice room, bit far out though”
Reviews.Author: WazzaTroy
Reviews.Content: We had intended to stay else where but place booked at had no carparking this hotel has ample free carparking. The room we had was away from main building and had own kitchen, toilet/bathroom, 1 bedroom and a lounge. Because there was 2 of us we moved one of the single beds into the lounge to give us more room and make it easier to sleeep. The hotel has a nice breakfast, cheap internet and a sauna and gym area. This hotel is a bit far out from Berlin town centre and train is a far hike away.

Reviews.Title: “Almost like renting a flat”
Reviews.Author: stephanuk
Reviews.Content: This is truly an aparthotel with very spacious rooms. There is a proper kitchen area, a large bathroom with window and a large main room with seating corner. The style is a little dated and office like with vertical blinds. Booked through HRS it was very good value for money. But WiFi and breakfast are not included in the standard rate. It's a good 5min walk to the next S-Bahn station and restaurants.

Reviews.Title: “Good, but a little far away from the city center”
Reviews.Author: Qingboxu
Reviews.Content: Stay 3 nights. A lovely 4-star hotel. Great room facility, with kichennett. Helpful staff. The location is quite far away from the city center. A quiet surrounding. No resturant/shop/supermarket around. at least 10min walk to the nearest subway station. And it takes about 30min by subway to the main train station.

HotelInfo.Name: Michels Apart Hotel Berlin
HotelInfo.Address: Heerstrasse 80 | Charlottenburg, 14055 Berlin, Germany
